content: @Eric Haas - your comment on task GF#12148 - I don't follow the logic of 'add specimen to it'?
I added some analysis on the task around common search parameters....

@Eric Haas, it's still not clear to me: "search across DiagnosticReport and Observation and Specimen for code, patient, date, specimen type" - why are you searching specimen as well? - can you provide some example searches, and explain what they do?
I confess it does not make sense to me either after reviewing it.
